verbs.description: [ARG1: rooney] [V: stopped] [ARGM-LOC: in a shootout crew advance past united wayne rooney was stopped on a shootout attempt in his mls playoff debut] nick deleon skied d c united final kick over the crossbar and the columbus crew beat d c united 3 - 2 on penalty kicks after they tied 2 - 2 on thursday night columbus goalkeeper zack steffen denied united top two scorers in rooney and luciano acosta patrick mullins who was traded to columbus from d c earlier this year had a chance to win it but his penalty shot hit the post and deleon was n't close on the final attempt harrison afful washington columbus crew ap artur crew nick deleon united association football columbus ohio patrick mullins citizens for responsibility and ethics in washington wayne rooney soccer federico higuain d c united niko hansen columbus frederic brillant federico higuaín milton valenzuela zack steffen luciano acosta wil trapp major league soccer mls rooney

rooney stopped in a shootout crew advance past united wayne rooney [V: was] stopped on a shootout attempt in his mls playoff debut nick deleon skied d c united final kick over the crossbar and the columbus crew beat d c united 3 - 2 on penalty kicks after they tied 2 - 2 on thursday night columbus goalkeeper zack steffen denied united top two scorers in rooney and luciano acosta patrick mullins who was traded to columbus from d c earlier this year had a chance to win it but his penalty shot hit the post and deleon was n't close on the final attempt harrison afful washington columbus crew ap artur crew nick deleon united association football columbus ohio patrick mullins citizens for responsibility and ethics in washington wayne rooney soccer federico higuain d c united niko hansen columbus frederic brillant federico higuaín milton valenzuela zack steffen luciano acosta wil trapp major league soccer mls rooney
